ai-patthana15.63:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.63:0.3_0: doing the things that are skillful, (permission) skillful,
ai-patthana15.63:1.1_0: A skillful teaching gives rise to the sensuous worlds, and doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.63:1.1_1: Not doing the following things, they don’t give rise to skillful thoughts.
ai-patthana15.63:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.63:2.1_0: By the doing of the sense-spheres there is no cause or condition for unskillful things.
ai-patthana15.63:2.1_3: What are the two kinds of temperament?
